DataElement.preferredName: Study Site Lead Or Consortium or Network Professional Organization or Group Flag ISO21090.BL.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Specifies whether this is the principal administrative organization responsible for the study. NOTE(S): In the case of a multi-site trial with no single assigned coordination center, every participating organization can be named as lead organization.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Study Site Lead Or Consortium or Network Professional Organization or Group Flag
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted._Be in charge of; a position of leadership.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:Groups of scientists who link their expertise and resources in collaborative efforts to address important questions of shared interest.:A formal group of people that exists to further a particular profession.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted.

Concepts.definition: A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Groups of scientists who link their expertise and resources in collaborative efforts to address important questions of shared interest.
A formal group of people that exists to further a particular profession.
An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: DEC released per model owner approval. mc 2/2/11

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
